item.title: product testing

item.content:encoded: Dear Tech Companies, I am available for product testing and will publish reviews on this blog. I am interested in any tech products. Please send inquiries about product testing to gombergresolution@gmail.com.

item.title: Tech world
item.dc:creator: maxwell1212
item.content:encoded: Hi, my name is Maxwell. I am professional technician, coder, and developer. Here are some computer tricks: first click on the Windows button, then at the same time click on the R button on the keyboard. Then, type  "Notepad" into the dialogue box. Type the following code into Notepad: @echo off color 0a :start echo %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% %random% goto start Save as maxwell.bat Today we just made a batch file. The program we made is called  Matrix. Disclaimer Maxwell Gomberg is not responsible for any damage on your computer.

item.title: Tech world 2
item.dc:creator: maxwell1212
item.content:encoded:
Hi, my name is Maxwell. I am a professional technician, coder, and developer mechanic in training. Today I am going to teach you how to make a Virtual Basic Script (VBS)
1. First click the windows button. 2. Next, at the same time, click on the r button and type in notepad. 3. Type in code Dim FavCol FavCol = "red" Select Case FavCol Case "Black" msgbox("what is your name") Case "red" msgbox("what is your favorite thing to do ") Case "Yellow" msgbox("what is your favorite subject") Case Else msgbox("how are you")
4. End Select then save it as example.vbs you just made a vbs.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: AMAZING JOB I LEARNED A LOT

item.title: God mode on windows
item.dc:creator: maxwell1212
item.content:encoded: Hi, My name is Maxwell. I am professional technician, coder, and developer.  Today i will teach you about god mode on windows 10. First go on the main screen. Then right click then when right click on the main screen you will see new then you will see folder. Then name it GodMode.{ED7BA470-8E54-465E-825C-99712043E01C} Now you have god mode then click on it then you have a menu of programs that will make your life easier. Disclaimer Maxwell Gomberg is not responsible for any damage on your computer.

item.title: The Best Motion Sensor 2019
item.dc:creator: maxwell1212
item.content:encoded: Hi, My name is Maxwell. I am a professional technician, coder, developer, and mechanic in training. Today I am reviewing the Kangaroo motion sensor. Here are some images[gallery ids="68,69" type="rectangular"] Here is a coupon code for 20 percent off your next purchase MAXWELL20. Here is the link to the website. https://heykangaroo.com/. The devices are solid, high quality and well designed. The battery life is 6 to 12 months. All the devices I tested work as promised. The app is easy to use and notifications pinpoint the location of any breach that is detected. The packaging is sleek and the units themselves are small and easy to conceal. I recommend this product highly as an alternative to expensive subscription-based systems. Sincerely, Maxwell Gomberg

item.title: Travel tips and Best Airlines
item.dc:creator: maxwell1212
item.content:encoded: Hi, My name is Maxwell. I am a professional technician, coder, developer, and mechanic in training. When you are planning a big trip sometimes it is hard to find the best deal. So you can use a vpn called Okayfreedom vpn. https://www.okayfreedom.com/en/ The best sites to use are Ryan air and Ita Matrix here are the links https://www.ryanair.com/us/en/ & https://matrix.itasoftware.com/ https://bookwithmatrix.com/ The first one we chose Ryan Air because it is cheapest option for flying within Europe only. It is the cheapest airline ever. I recommend to others for business travel. The Vpn make everything cheaper because cheaper the currency cheaper the flight.

item.title: Worlds best gaming monitor
item.dc:creator: maxwell1212
item.content:encoded: Today I will be reviewing a gaming monitor. It is the best gaming monitor I ever saw. I recommend to others. High quality also it is a very nice set up. The reason I recommenced this gaming monitor because it is very responsive. Nice monitor. Totally recommend it to others. Very nice display. It has a very great interface. I also like because it is very portable. You can even put in your backpack. That how good it is. Recommend to others highly. There for I give a 5 star rating. Here Is the link of the monitor https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07V1SQ966/ref=ox_sc_saved_title_3?smid=A1GKCCB83E4OXA&psc=1 See you next blog post please comment down below.
